body.p: Examples S and T are intended only to illustrate the application of the amendments to IAS 1 and the four-step materiality process to accounting policy information. They do not illustrate the application of the definition of material to all disclosure requirements of IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers and IAS 36 Impairment of Assets. An entity is also required to comply with the other disclosure requirements of those IFRS Standards.
